verses.text: Ach wuninal, cha ab' in lolonel tik. Ha juntzanh in checnab'il swak' tik t'ayach, yowalil tza sik'kan t'a a pensar.
k'anab'ajej in checnab'il tik yet' in k'ayb'ub'al yic wach' ol ach ek'oc. Icha scutej ko ya'ilan snenal yol ko sat, icha chi' tzutej a ya'ilan a kachnab'il swak' tik.
Naannhejokab' uuj, tza sik'ankan t'a a pensar.
Xajanej a jelanil yujto icha anab' yaji, ma icha a wach'k'ool.
Icha chi' ol aj a colchajel t'a yol sk'ab' ix ajmul ix, aton ix ayxo yetb'eyum, ix te wach' smontan yet' slolonel.
Ay junel ix wilelta t'a swentenail in pat,
ay juntzanh heb' winh kelemtac malaj jab'oc sjelanil ayeq'ui. Axo ix wilani, ay jun winh malaj jab'oc spensar t'a skal heb' winh chi'.
Ayic wanxo yem k'u, wanxo sq'uik'b'i, ix eq'uixk'och winh t'a jun esquina, ix sk'axpitanek' calle winh, t'a stojolal b'aj ay spat jun ix ix ay yetb'eyum.
Ix elta lemnaj ix scha winh. Icha spichul heb' ix ajmul ix spichul ix ayochi, icha pax spensar heb' ix chi' spensar ix.
Comonnhej slolon ix, max q'uixwilaj jab'oc ix, max emlaj k'ojan ix t'a spat.
Anhej t'a yoltac calle tzek' ix, t'a mercado yet' t'a yesquinailtac calle, ata' smaclej ix yek' junok winak.
Ha jun ix chi', ix och lak'naj ix t'a winh quelem chi', ix och tz'ub'naj ix t'a sti' winh, maj q'uixwoclaj jab'oc ix, ix yalan ix icha tik:
Ha ticnaik ix wak' in silab' yic in junk'olal alb'ilxo wuuj, yuj chi' ayto nok' chib'ej t'a in pat ticnaik.
Yuj chi' ix in elta ach in maclej, yujto in gana tzach wila''. Tik ach ilchaj wuuj.
Ha t'a sat in ch'at toxo ix in lich'em jun sábana nab'a lino, cotnac t'a Egipto.
Toxo ix wak'och perfume t'ay, toxonhej suk'uq'ui sjab', aton mirra, áloes yet' te' canela.
Cotanh wed'oc, ol kak' wal ko gana masanto ol sacb'oc. Ol kak' wal tzalajb'oc ko k'ool ko xajanan ko b'a.
Ha winh wetb'eyum, malaj winh ayek' t'a in pat tik, yujto ay b'aj te najat ix b'at winh.
Ix yik'b'at jun mucuc k'een tumin winh, yuj chi' manto ol jalaj winh masanto ol k'och sk'ual sk'ojnaj k'een uj, xchi ix ix chi'.
Ha tas te wach' ix yal ix chi', elanhchamel ix montaj winh quelem chi' yuj.
Yuj chi' ix och tzak'an winh yuj ix, icha yik'jib'at junok nok' wakax b'aj ol chamoc, ma icha junok nok' k'ultaquil chej skan t'a ch'anh yaal,
masanto ol ek' junok jul-lab' t'a spixan nok'. Icha pax junok nok' much skan t'a te' yaal, icha chi' yaj winh, max snalaj jab'oc winh tato ha t'a spat ix chi' ol cham winh.
Yuj chi' ach wuninal, maclej ab' tas swala'. Tanhwej wal ab' in lolonel tik.
Manh a juel a wach' b'eyb'al t'a junok ix ix icha chi' spensar, yic wach' manh ol ach sateloc.
Yujto tzijtumxo mach toxo ix cham yuj heb' ix ix icha chi' sk'ulej. Manhxo b'ischajb'enoc mach scham yuj heb' ix.
Tato tzach b'at t'a sb'eal spat heb' ix ix icha chi', wan a b'atkan t'a sb'eal chamel.
